net.openhft.chronicle.engine.api.pubsub

Interface Publisher<E>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Reference<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapReference, QueueReference, RemoteReference

    public interface Publisher<E>
    A handle to Publish to a specific topic.

      • publish

        long publish(E event)
        Publish an event
        Parameters:
        event - to publish
        Returns:
        the index when using a chronicle queue, for other types zero is returned

        void registerSubscriber(boolean bootstrap,
                        int throttlePeriodMs,
                        Subscriber<E> subscriber)
                 throws AssetNotFoundException
        Add a subscription to this specific topic
        Parameters:
        bootstrap - to bootstrap
        throttlePeriodMs - 0 for no throttling, otherwise the period of throttling in milliseconds
        subscriber - to register @throws AssetNotFoundException if the topic no longer

        AssetNotFoundException
